item.description:
Owl's Head (aka - 3rd times a charm)

I'd like to hike this Wed (9/24) to a summit that has eluded me twice... Owls Head. I know the bad rap that Owls Head gets but it's not as bad as everyone says it is and the water crossings can be "fun".

So, I'm hoping at least one of you is willing to join me in my pursuit of Owls Head. It's the only summit I need before I go on my Bonds traverse (which will complete my NH48).

So if you are able, willing, crazy (or all of the above) to join me then RSVP "YES" today!

Approx 18 miles
2850 elevation gain
10:30 book time
item.name: Owls Head (aka- 3rd times a charm)
